title: Kubernetes-Native Infrastructure with Crossplane & GitOps
desc:
Spearheaded migration from Terraform to Kubernetes-native infrastructure as code (IaC) using Crossplane, revolutionizing deployment processes across the department.

Automated configuration management with Crossplane's reconciliation loop, eliminating infrastructure drift and reducing maintenance overhead. Architected and deployed GitOps workflow with Argo CD that transformed infrastructure provisioning for developers from a 2-week process to 5-10 minutes through self-service GitHub repositories and automated synchronization.
highlights: Migrated from Terraform to Crossplane for Kubernetes-native IaC
Eliminated infrastructure drift (~100%) with automated reconciliation
Reduced maintenance overhead by ~30% through automation
Implemented GitOps workflow with Argo CD
Reduced provisioning time from 2 weeks to 5-10 minutes
Enabled self-service infrastructure through GitHub repositories
